projects.title: Basic calculator
projects.description: A basic calculator made by me,you can sum,subtract,multiply and divide,also you can use more advanced functions like square roots or square numbers.

projects.title: Guess the color game
projects.description: A simple guess the color game,if you guess the color by an rgb value showed on the top of the page,you win the game.You can select between two dificulty levels,easy(only 3 options) or hard (6 options)

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: The clasic tic tac toe game,the game you used to play with your friends in the school but in a web page, the player who matches 3 in a row,wins

projects.title: Simple landing page
projects.description: This simple landing page is a project that I made as a frontend mentor project,so the design is not mine,but I copy it perfectly on this page.

projects.title: Task list
projects.description: With this simple task list you can take notes or the day-to-day tasks,this web has the functionality of save your notes also if you close it and later you open it again

projects.title: hanged man game
projects.description: the classic hanged man game , you have 6 tries to find out wich word is hidden behind the low bars

projects.title: weather app
projects.description: A simple weather app , you can enter a city/coutry and get how the weather is like there
